body_html: @soumith @fmassa Does it make more sense to implement a im2col/col2im layer in THNN backend or promote im2col/col2im as tensor functions in TH and define them as differentiable tensor functions? I'm not entirely sure where the delineation is between TH and THNN in this case.
body_text: @soumith @fmassa Does it make more sense to implement a im2col/col2im layer in THNN backend or promote im2col/col2im as tensor functions in TH and define them as differentiable tensor functions? I'm not entirely sure where the delineation is between TH and THNN in this case.
body: @soumith @fmassa Does it make more sense to implement a im2col/col2im layer in THNN backend or promote im2col/col2im as tensor functions in TH and define them as differentiable tensor functions? I'm not entirely sure where the delineation is between TH and THNN in this case.
